FuncDef: This command configures up to five proxy ARP policies for the interface.

ParaDef.Info: The export route policy name. Allowed values are any string up to 32 characters long composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes. The specified name(s) must already be defined. Up to 5 route policies can be specified in a single statement.
